title: Like Boys
lyrics:
Nanananana, nanananana
Say it, say it, say it, say it, say it, say it, say it twice
[Verse]
Don't you ever let it go it's over
'Cause you know I think our lives were better

You might call it rollercoaster

Say it, say it twice, say it, say it, say it twice

Remember when [?]

I'm still ain't over

We're on the same now

Let me tell no, playing solo

Know you were my worst hangover



[Pre-Chorus 1]

You find drama when you go low

Baby I'm crying out for you

You got only questions not the answers

'Cause it's never over

Say it, say it twice



[Chorus]

I don't even like boys, don't you understand?

It's just the right time, don't you understand?

I don't even like boys, don't you understand?

It's just the right time, don't you understand?



[Post-Chorus]

Just give it up no, just give it up and go down

Give it up no, I can't believe you get down

Give it up no, I can't believe you're so down

'Cause we know now [?]

Just give it up no, just give it up and go down

Give it up no, I can't believe you get down

Give it up no, I can't believe you're so down

'Cause we know now [?]





[Verse 2]

Don't you ever let it go it's over

'Cause I came to [?]

We're on the same now

Let me tell no, playing solo

Know you were my worst hangover



[Pre-Chorus 1]

You find drama when you go low

Baby I'm crying out for you

'Cause I'm never near the go go

Never go low, trying to follow is wherever you go

We're on the same now

Let me tell no [?] playing solo

I can drop the beat so low, I can drop the beat so low

I can trip [?]

'Cause you can't get my [?]

[?]

You bipolar rollercoaster

Say it, say it twice, say it, say it, say it twice



[Chorus]

I don't even like boys, don't you understand?

It's just the right time, don't you understand?

I don't even like boys, don't you understand?

It's just the right time, don't you understand?



[Post-Chorus]

Just give it up no, just give it up and go down

Give it up no, I can't believe you get down

Give it up no, I can't believe you're so down

'Cause we know now [?]

Just give it up no, just give it up and go down

Give it up no, I can't believe you get down

Give it up no, I can't believe you're so down

'Cause we know now [?]
